pacman.model

类 Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.model.Score

  • public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores score of the game, including Text score and Text lifes.
    作者:
    Zhangli Wang
    另请参阅:
    GameModel
